name: Advanced Watch Complications
description: Advanced localized date and time watch complications for Wear OS. These complication can be added to any watch face and allow display of all possible date and fields in any language and calendar.  This is a 7-day trial. After the trial you will be offered the option to purchase the app via an in-app purchase.  You can select any date and time field and any combination, like full date, week number, quarter number. You can configure the timezone, calendar and language.  Also you can set a custom action when you tap the complication.  Supported calendars: Gregorian Calendar, Gregorian, ISO-8601, Buddhist, Chinese, Coptic, Dangi, Ethiopic, Ethiopic Amete Alem, Hebrew, Indian National, Islamic, Japanese, Persian, Minguo  The islamic calendar supports the following variants: Tabular, civil epoch; Saudi Arabia, sighting; tabular, astronomical epoch; Umm al-Qura  Complications support the following languages:  Afrikaans, Aghem, Akan, , , , Kipare, asturianu, azrbaycan, sa, , Ichibemba, Hibena, , bamanakan, , , brezhoneg, , bosanski, catal, , Rukiga, ,  , etina, Cymraeg, dansk, Kitaita, Deutsch, Zarmaciine, dolnoserbina, dul, joola, , Kembu, Eegbe, , English, esperanto, espaol, eesti, euskara, ewondo, , Pulaar, suomi, Filipino, froyskt, franais, furlan, West-Frysk, Gaeilge, Gidhlig, galego, Schwiizerttsch, , Ekegusii, Gaelg, Hausa, lelo Hawaii, , , hrvatski, hornjoserbina, magyar, , Indonesia, Igbo, , slenska, italiano, , Ndaa, Kimachame, , Taqbaylit, Kikamba, Chimakonde, kabuverdianu, Koyra ciini, Gikuyu,  , kak, kalaallisut, Kalenjin, , , , , , Kishambaa, rikpa, Klsch, kernewek, , Klaangi, Ltzebuergesch, Luganda, Lakliyapi, lingla, ,  , lietuvi, Tshiluba, Dholuo, Luluhia, latvieu, Maa, Kmr, kreol morisien, Malagasy, Makua, meta, , , , , Bahasa Melayu, Malti, MUNDA, , , Khoekhoegowab, norsk bokml, isiNdebele, nds, , Nederlands, nmg, nynorsk, Shw ngiembn, Thok Nath, Runyankore, Oromoo, , , , polski, , portugus, Runasimi, rumantsch, Ikirundi, romn, Kihorombo, , Kinyarwanda, Kiruwa,  , Kisampur, Ishisangu, davvismegiella, sena, Koyraboro senni, Sng, , , slovenina, slovenina, anarkiel, chiShona, Soomaali, shqip, , svenska, Kiswahili, , , Kiteso, , , lea fakatonga, Trke, Tasawaq senni, Tamazit n lala, , , , ozbek, , Ting Vit, Kyivunjo, Walser, Olusoga, nuasue, , d Yorb, , , , isiZulu
